main event: Multiple witnesses observed unidentified objects in the sky in Lycoming, New York.
interesting points: The first observer described a round, silvery object that appeared stationary before accelerating rapidly,The sighting lasted approximately 60 seconds and was not attributed to any conventional aircraft,At least three brightly lit objects were reported by another witness moving erratically and hovered for about 15 minutes, One object described by witnesses was oblong and dark gray, measuring approximately 30 feet long and 10 feet wide,Mr. and Mrs. Harold Michelson reported the sighting of the oblong object traveling at high speed without any sound.
sighted object: one round silvery object and multiple brightly lit erratic objects
witness description: Civilian observers, including Mr. and Mrs. Harold Michelson
